title: I've passed 3 of 4 tests of the GED, except math. I’ve taken it 3 times, and failed. How do I pass the GED Math test? - Quora

response.answer_text: You may need to hire a tutor to go over a few areas which you are weak. Some libraries may also provide such tutoring for free. Check your local school district for any resources, or even an “adult school” to help pass the math test.
